barcode4j 2.1.0

Package org.krysalis.barcode4j.tools

This package contains support classes for Barcode4J.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Base64InputStream Base64-implementation as an InputStream reading Base64-encoded data from a Reader.
ConfigurationUtil This utility class provides helper methods for Avalon Configuration objects.
DebugUtil Useful stuff for debugging.
IOUtil Utility functions for I/O operations.
Length This class represents a length (value plus unit).
MessagePatternUtil Helper class to apply custom message pattern (i.e. message characters grouping) to barcode messages.
MessageUtil Utilities for pre-processing messages.
MimeTypes Defines MIME types used in Barcode4J.
PageInfo Holds information on the page a barcode is painted on.
UnitConv Utility class for unit conversions.
URLUtil Utility functions for handling URLs.
VariableUtil Helper class to replace certain variables in the barcode message.
 

Package org.krysalis.barcode4j.tools Description

This package contains support classes for Barcode4J.
